function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective communication leading to increased social fear related to COVID-19","Impact":"Reinforcement of uncertainty and social crisis, exacerbation of stigma and discrimination","Mitigation":"Implement effective communication strategies, address social fear and stigma, provide accurate information","Technologies":"Online platforms, social networks, telephones helplines, and internet access","People":"Community members, infected individuals, and individuals in quarantine settings","Owner":"Healthcare professionals, scientific community, and community leaders"},{"Description":"Inadequate psychological support leading to negative emotions and psychological distress","Impact":"Increased anxiety, frustration, and negative emotions, risk of worsened psychological distress","Mitigation":"Provide adequate psychological services, recognize stigma and discrimination as major challenges, implement dedicated blogs and forums","Technologies":"Online platforms, dedicated blogs, telephones helplines, and internet access","People":"Community members, infected individuals, and individuals in quarantine settings","Owner":"Healthcare professionals, scientific community, and community leaders"},{"Description":"Lack of early and effective management of health emergency in hospitals","Impact":"Risk of inadequate care for COVID-19 patients, increased risk of transmission in healthcare settings","Mitigation":"Implement hospital protocols for health emergencies, supply healthcare professionals with adequate protective facilities","Technologies":"Hospital protocols, protective facilities, and early management systems","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients, and community members","Owner":"Hospital administrations and healthcare professionals"}]}
